title: Designing University Chemistry Education with Blended Learning: Project-Based Intensive Short Course

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Learners use personal devices (BYOD) to simultaneously engage with online content and offline activities, performing team-based chemistry experiment design and analysis projects

learning_goals: In blended learning environments, learners can explain core principles of chemical experiment design with over 80% accuracy.
Using digital tools (e.g., simulation software, data analysis tools), learners can complete chemical reaction analysis projects.
Learners can evaluate team-based project outcomes using peer assessment criteria with at least three measurable indicators.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
